VII.i.2.D.11.c
.
Evidence to Establish That a Same-Sex Couple Cohabitated Beyond the Marriage Dates
Evidence that may prove a Veteran and a same-sex surviving spouse held themselves out to the public as cohabitating in a committed relationship akin to that of marriage includes
lease agreements
joint bank statements
utility bills
tax returns
insurance forms
employment records, and
any other document requiring the individual to indicate marital status.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Establishing Marital Relationship in Survivors Cases
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
